description:
Yuuta has invited the members of his club to dinner at his home to meet his nieces.  Shuntarou is overwhelmed by Miu and Hina, while Raika is smitten with Sora.  Life with Yuuta and the girls have become routine, and what to do about the upcoming school term was the next family problem.  But a visit from the Landlord has changed everything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Thanks for Always Putting Up with Us
毎度おさわがせします
